resources.string: Please enter the application package name
Failed to obtain signature information, please check whether the entered package name is correct

This tool is only used for developers to obtain the signature information of their applications and to verify the correctness of the developer platform. The correctness of the application signature needs to be determined by the developer.
Don\'t prompt for this message in the future

This tool is intended to obtain the signature MD5 information of third-party applications installed on Android devices. It is only for developers to verify the signature information of their applications. Click \"Confirm\" to continue the operation, or click \"Cancel\" to exit the program.
